---
name: New Release
about: Checklist for new releases
title: Release version x.y.z
labels: ''
assignees: niko2342

---

# Checklist

- [ ] Update version in [Cargo.toml](https://github.com/deutsche-nationalbibliothek/pica-rs/blob/main/Cargo.toml)
- [ ] Update version and release date in [README](https://github.com/deutsche-nationalbibliothek/pica-rs/blob/main/README.md)
- [ ] Update version and release date in [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/deutsche-nationalbibliothek/pica-rs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md)
- [ ] Update version in [installation.md](https://github.com/deutsche-nationalbibliothek/pica-rs/blob/main/docs/book/src/de/guide/installation.md)
- [ ] Update version in [CITATION.cff](https://github.com/deutsche-nationalbibliothek/pica-rs/blob/main/CITATION.cff)
- [ ] Create release notes (breaking changes, pica-perf stats)
